Headline: Israel bombs Gaza City in 2nd day of strikes since breaking cease-fire
Text: Israel bombed Gaza for the second straight day Thursday as a cease-fire signed last month appeared to be falling apart between the two sides.The Israeli government said it targeted Hamas sites in Gaza City and Khan Younis late Thursday. Explosions could be seen in the night sky from the jet strikes."Over the past day, arson balloons were launched from the Gaza Strip into Israeli territory," the IDF said in a statement.
